name: Arcadroid
description:
WE ARE CELEBRATING THE PREMIERE OF OUR NEW AWESOME GAME FREDERIC - RESURRECTION OF MUSIC. CHECK IT OUT!

Come back to classic ideas in a new, glamorous graphic design!

Become a captain of a stellar minesweeper. Stellar tracks and fleet career are waiting for you. Cosmic pirates, rebels and bloodthirsty aliens- all of them using mine fields floating in the airspace during the fight. Although it may seem that the role of sapper is less spectacular than the fighter aircraft pilot but it is de-minig of road leading to the rear of the enemy that has a crucial meaning in a battle! And you have to do this in the heart of the battle, in the meteorite shower and among the floating remains of crushed spaceships. A challenge is waiting for you!

- Wonderful, colourful cosmic views
- Two control methods including using a accelerometer
- Absorbing story line
- 21 stages where new attractions are waiting for you
- A lot of achievements to gain



The fate of terrestrial civilization is in danger! And you can help in that galactic war!
